faqs.question: How do I cancel my membership?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your membership through the app by going to Membership > Cancel Membership. Please note that a 30-day notice period is required, and cancellation will be effective on your next billing date.

faqs.question: Can I freeze my membership?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can freeze your membership up to 2 times per year for a maximum of 30 days each time. Contact our support team or visit the gym to request a freeze.

faqs.question: How do I update my payment method?
faqs.answer: Go to Billing in your account settings to update your payment method. We accept credit cards, debit cards, and SEPA direct debit.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), debit cards, and SEPA direct debit for European customers.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund if I cancel?
faqs.answer: Refunds are only provided for the unused portion of your membership if you have a valid medical reason with documentation. Regular cancellations follow the 30-day notice period without refunds.

faqs.question: What are your gym hours?
faqs.answer: Our gym is open 24/7 for all members. Staff is available Monday-Friday 6am-10pm, Saturday-Sunday 8am-8pm.

faqs.question: How do I book a class?
faqs.answer: You can book classes through the app by navigating to Classes and selecting the class you want to attend. Premium members get priority booking 7 days in advance.

faqs.question: Can I bring a guest?
faqs.answer: Yes! Premium members receive 5 guest passes per month. Your guest must sign a waiver at the front desk before using the facilities.

faqs.question: Do you offer personal training?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer personal training sessions. Premium members receive one complimentary session per month. Additional sessions can be purchased separately.

faqs.question: What equipment do you have?
faqs.answer: We have a full range of cardio equipment, free weights, resistance machines, functional training area, boxing bags, BJJ mats, and more. Check our website for a complete list.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Password' and enter your email address. You'll receive a password reset link within a few minutes.

faqs.question: How do I update my personal information?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Edit Profile to update your name, email, phone number, and address.

faqs.question: Can I use the app for check-in?
faqs.answer: Yes! Use the QR code check-in feature on the home screen. Simply scan the code at the entrance kiosk or show it to staff.

faqs.question: The app isn't working. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Try these steps: 1) Make sure you have the latest version of the app, 2) Force quit and restart the app, 3) Check your internet connection, 4) If issues persist, contact support.

faqs.question: How do I enable notifications?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Notifications to manage your notification preferences. You can customize reminders for classes, billing, and gym announcements.

faqs.question: What should I bring to the gym?
faqs.answer: We recommend bringing a towel, water bottle, and appropriate workout attire. Lockers are available, and towel rental is included with Premium memberships.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free parking for all members in our dedicated parking lot. Street parking is also available nearby.

faqs.question: Do you have showers and changing rooms?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have full locker rooms with showers, changing areas, and amenities. Premium members have access to premium lockers.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can contact us via email at support@omoplata.com, call us at (555) 123-4567, or speak with staff at the front desk during operating hours.

faqs.question: Can I transfer my membership to someone else?
faqs.answer: Memberships are non-transferable according to our terms and conditions. However, you can freeze your membership if you need a temporary break.
